title: Get and change function definition IDAPython
content: I was wondering if it is possible to retrieve the function definition at ea and eventually how to edit it. This feature should be in idaapi but unfortunately there's basically no documentation about that.

comments.text: You mean to get the current function at n address? or get the function signature including parameters and return value?
The function signature including parameters and return value.
I don't think it's possible from ida python because of that part is done by hex-rays. It's not always 100% accurate anyway
